```{r}
load("hw4-1.Rdata")
n <- length(myDat)
theta_hat <- -n / sum(log(myDat))
SE <- theta_hat / sqrt(n)
CI <- theta_hat + c(-1,1)*1.645*SE
cat("Standard Error:", SE, "\n")
cat("90% Confidence Interval: (", CI[1], ",", CI[2], ")\n")
```

```{r}
mylogLik <- function(theta, dat){
  if(theta < 0) return(-Inf)
  sum(dbeta(dat, shape1 = theta, shape2 = 1, log = TRUE))
}
fit <- optim(par=1, fn=mylogLik, dat=myDat, method="BFGS", control=list(fnscale=-1), hessian=TRUE)
theta_hat <- fit$par
SE <- sqrt(1 / (-fit$hessian))
SE <- as.vector(SE)
CI <- theta_hat + c(-1,1)*1.645*SE
cat("Standard Error:", SE, "\n")
cat("90% Confidence Interval: (", CI[1], ",", CI[2], ")\n")
```
